title: Activist Pushback in Japan MBOs Drives Higher Bids, Share Gains
description: Activist funds are increasingly disrupting Japanese privatizations, pushing for better protection of minority investors and driving up share prices as their pressure leads to higher bids and counteroffers.
content: Activist funds are increasingly disrupting Japanese privatizations, pushing for better protection of minority investors and driving up share prices as their pressure leads to higher bids and counteroffers.
